description: FastAPI route handlers for notes management, including listing, creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting notes.

methods.name: list_notes_endpoint
methods.description: Handles GET requests to list notes with optional search and pagination.

methods.name: create_note_endpoint
methods.description: Handles POST requests to create a new note.

methods.name: get_note_endpoint
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve a specific note by ID.

methods.name: update_note_endpoint
methods.description: Handles PUT requests to update an existing note by ID.

methods.name: delete_note_endpoint
methods.description: Handles DELETE requests to remove a note by ID.
